text:
Giuseppe Mifsud Bonnici (17 July 1930 – 21 February 2019) was a Maltese judge and philosopher. He was Chief Justice of Malta between 1990 and 1995. He worked in the philosophy of law. Bonnici was born in Cospicua, Malta. He was a member of the European Court of Human Rights from 1992 to 1998.
Bonnici died on 21 February 2019 in Valletta, Malta from lung cancer, aged 88.
